game.name: Aura
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Restore the cosmos. In this immersive RPG adventure for PC and VR, wield magic and steel to heal corrupted goddesses, dragons, demons, and fae. Journey through a shattered universe and uncover the mystery behind its destruction—your destiny is to bring it back to life.
